item.title: About
item.description:
My name is Pawel Sobala and I am a data science enthusiast. My interests encompass (but are not limited to) the statistical programming language R, data analysis, financial markets, cyber insurance and football. For my professional experience, please refer to my LinkedIn page.

In addition to the blog entries I am posting regularly on Twitter (some tweets are in polish though).

You can reach me via social media on Twitter and GitHub.

This site is built using Hugo and blogdown. It is deployed using Netlify. The theme was forked from cocoa-eh. The logo is created utilizing Hatchful.

A goal without a plan is just a wish.

Night Flight by Antoine de Saint-Exupery

item.title: Ideas
item.description:
In preparation or in my mind are articles related to the following topics:

  • Analysis of the tq_get() function
  • Implementating the Cyber Insurance Pricing Model
  • Performing a Gold/Silver ratio analysis
  • Analysis on relation between ISM, stock returns, [inspiration]
  • Analysis of webscraped data from Willhaben and Allegro
  • Modelling Stock Market using Kohonen Map, [idea]
  • Creating a R course, [inspiration]
  • Creating a R package based on some codes that I wrote
  • Financial analysis including machine learning/deep learning techniques
  • Sharing experiences on participating in a Kaggle competition
  • DALEX package
  • Tidy Text Mining with R
  • …

The author reserves the right to publish those articles in no particular order.

Some enhancements I wish to apply to the cocoa-eh Hugo theme:

  • Add inbuilt contact form
